thread.title: Will Natty team up with Raai Laxmi for his next?
thread.title_full: Will Natty team up with Raai Laxmi for his next? - The Times of India

author: Janani Karthik
title: Will Natty team up with Raai Laxmi for his next?
text:
Cinematographer-turned-actor Natarajan Subramaniam of Sathuranga Vettai fame has finalised his next film. He will be teaming up with debutant director Taj, for a travel film. Confirming the news, Natty says, "Taj narrated the script and I really liked it. But we are yet to sign on the dotted line. The story unfolds during the course of a road trip, a genre that I haven't tried so far as an actor. We are planning to start shooting from December."
While reports claim that Raai Laxmi has been approached as the female lead, Natty says, "Raai Laxmi has been approached, yes, but she is yet to come back to us with dates and confirm." Meanwhile, Natty recently wrapped up his current film, Enkitta Modhadhaey, in which he is playing the lead.
